North_Las_Vegas.Texas Station:
Texas Station is a hotel and casino located on Rancho Drive in North Las Vegas, Nevada. It is owned and operated by Station Casinos.


== History ==
The casino was designed and built by Marnell Corrao Associates for Station Casinos and opened on July 12, 1995 with 200 rooms and 123,045-square-foot (11,431.3 m2) casino.
